text: (he nabee!) aap unhen apane paalanahaar kee raah (islaam) kee or tatvadarshita tatha sadupadesh ke saath bulaen aur unase aise andaaz mein shaastraarth karen, jo uttam ho. vaastav mein, allaah use adhik jaanata hai, jo usakee raah se vichalit ho gaya aur vahee supathon ko bhee adhik jaanata hai
